org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest

Class RestMethodHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest.RestMethodHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataModelRestMethodHandler, HttpRestAbstractR66Handler, RootOptionsRestMethodHandler

    public abstract class RestMethodHandler
extends Object
    Rest Method handler (used by Http Rest Handler)

      • RestMethodHandler

        protected RestMethodHandler(String name,
                            String path,
                            boolean isBodyJsonDecode,
                            RestConfiguration config,
                            HttpRestHandler.METHOD... method)
        Parameters:
        name - name associated with this Method Handler (to enable some HashMap or Enum classification)
        path - associated base Path
        isBodyJsonDecode - Is this method Handler using a Json as Body
        config - the associated configuration
        method - the associated methods
